submission:
class Solution:
    def countOfPairs(self, nums: List[int]) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        M = 10 ** 9 + 7
        mx = max(nums)
        dp = [[0] * (mx + 1) for _ in range(n)]
        f = nums[0]
        for j in range(f + 1): dp[0][j] += 1
        for i in range(1, n):
            dp2 = [0] * (mx + 1)
            for j in range(mx + 1):
                if j > 0: dp2[j] = (dp2[j - 1] + dp[i - 1][j]) % M
                else: dp2[j] = dp[i - 1][j]
            for j in range(nums[i] + 1):
                if nums[i] - j <= nums[i - 1]:
                    mi = min(nums[i - 1] - nums[i] + j, j)
                    if mi >= 0: dp[i][j] = dp2[mi]
                    else: dp[i][j] = 0
        res = 0
        for j in range(nums[n - 1] + 1): res = (res + dp[n - 1][j]) % M
        return res
